BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 070008 PSX, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter concerning the site selection of property located at Ryawa Avenue, Borough of the Bronx, Council District no. 17.
